meanings.definition: Gerolamo Cardano (1501–1576), an Italian polymath of the Renaissance, whose interests ranged from mathematics to medicine to astrology.
meanings.english_definition: An Italian polymath of the Renaissance, whose interests ranged from mathematics to medicine to astrology.

examples.sentence: Cardanus was one of the most influential mathematicians of his time.
examples.translation: カルダノは当時の最も影響力のある数学者の一人でした。

etymology.value: From the Latinized form of his Italian name, Gerolamo Cardano.
